rooms.name: Penthouse Living Area
rooms.description: Spacious open-plan living area that seamlessly integrates dining and entertainment spaces. Decor inspired by colonial aesthetics with luxury finishes, large windows for ample natural light and an inviting west-facing view.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A luxuriously appointed master bedroom featuring a private ensuite bathroom, walk-in closet, and abundant natural lighting. Designed with colonial elements and Vastu-compliant east-west orientation.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional bedroom with ample space, built-in wardrobes and a windowed design to ensure proper ventilation. Positioned to align with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom suitable for family members or guests, designed with colonial aesthetics and appropriate room dimensions following local norms.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: A smaller yet functional bedroom, incorporating traditional colonial design elements with modern luxury touches.

rooms.name: Penthouse Study/Home Office
rooms.description: Modern workspace designed for professional needs and personal leisure activities, ensuring privacy and ample lighting. Incorporates colonial motifs subtly.

openings.description: Traditional colonial-style entrance with ornate detailing. Positioned to face the south for security and privacy while maintaining a west-facing view from the main living spaces.
A colonial-style balcony offering panoramic views of the cityscape. Enhances the aesthetic appeal and provides an area for relaxation.

common_areas.name: Swimming Pool
common_areas.description: A luxurious swimming pool integrated into the ground floor, ensuring ample space and privacy. Designed with safety barriers, complementing the colonial and Vastu principles.

common_areas.name: Garden Courtyard
common_areas.description: A landscaped garden courtyard that serves as an outdoor living space. Incorporates indigenous plants and water features for aesthetic balance in accordance with Vastu.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom Suite
rooms.description: A well-appointed suite for guests with a private bathroom and walk-in closet. Designed to meet luxury standards.

rooms.name: Study/Library
rooms.description: A dedicated study/library area furnished with bookshelves and comfortable seating. Integrates colonial design elements with modern functionality.

openings.description: A balcony overlooking the garden courtyard, offering a serene space for relaxation and reading. Designed to maximize natural light.

rooms.name: Observation Deck
rooms.description: A mezzanine-level observation deck that provides panoramic views of the surrounding area. Designed as a private retreat area.

openings.description: Modern skylight installations ensuring maximum natural light and enhancing the colonial aesthetics with modern design elements.
